negotiable.translation[0].definitions[0]: an offer, price, contract etc that is negotiable can be discussed and changed before being agreed on
Part-time barman required. Hours and salary negotiable.
negotiable.translation[0].definitions[1]: a road, path etc that is negotiable can be travelled along
The road is only negotiable in the dry season.
negotiable.translation[0].definitions[2]: a cheque that is negotiable can be exchanged for money
negotiable.translation[1].definitions[0]: a negotiable document, such as a BANKNOTE or a BILL OF EXCHANGE, can be exchanged for money or goods
negotiable.translation[1].definitions[1]: an offer, price etc that is negotiable can be discussed and changed before being finally agreed on
The terms of the contract are not negotiable.
